title: Cause of rare pediatric brain disorder

title_detail.value: Cause of rare pediatric brain disorder

summary: Physician-scientists have identified the cause of a devastating pediatric brain disorder paving the way for the first step in developing potential therapies for this rare neurodegenerative condition.

summary_detail.value: Physician-scientists have identified the cause of a devastating pediatric brain disorder paving the way for the first step in developing potential therapies for this rare neurodegenerative condition.
